reviews.review_msg: He's very committed to making things clear for his students and he wants everyone to succeed. He is very knowledgable about politics and international relations and well-respected by students.

He's super nice and talks a lot (he's very passionate about politics!) and the tutorial parts are boring (you have to read at home and he makes you feel bad if you don't, but you'll do it anyways because he's nice). Other than that, he's a pretty easy marker and he'll help you if you need, but you won't.
Kevin is a amazing GPA booster Professor.

Great prof. Super friendly and makes you laugh even though the material can be pretty dry at times. Very clear and concise lectures and tutorials are extremely helpful, especially for writing the final paper/memo. He gave us a take home final exam too, which was fantastic. I definitely recommend this class if you're interested in Canadian politics.

HSCI 160 John Calvert is boring and uninteresting. Lecture material is straight out of the textbook. In fact, attending lectures could replace the need for reading the text. The class is curved so expect your A+ to drop to a B if it's not above 97%. The assignments are pointless and quiz questions can be answered using Google.
Totally a nice man, but his lectures are awful! Worse than watching the grass grow.  Maybe if you would use a computer rather than 30 overhead slides!
Pretty boring lecture, but he is a nice guy who knows his stuff. A looooot of readings!
awesome!! he's always funny in class or after class.  always wear shorts & a pair of converse

gotta love this guy.. most easy prof i've had at SFU. his italian accent is awesome and he goes off on tangents about how corrupt the italian government is LOL got an A, missed a few lectures.. no real point in going to class either as he gives out the notes.
VERY good class, geared towards expalining a difficult topic; easy to do well in.
Didn't learn anything from the lectures. Did well in the course by just reading the textbook. Going to lectures is pointless and they are very difficult to comprehend. Worst prof. I've had so far.

Migone is a great professor, despite the comments below. He is hilarious, and had the class in stiches quite often, in a class about THE CANADIAN BUREAUCRACY!  Without him that class would have been horrible - he led it well, and actually made it interesting.  He is left wing, but admits to being so very clearly.  I would love to take him again.
he's super easy-going and wants you to do well. that said, it's not like he's going to give you free grades either. but he will do all he can to help you get the high grade you want.
